column4: i installed ubuntu using crypt encryption.  If someone steals my PC, will they be able to access my Ubuntu?
i installed ubuntu using crypt encryption.  If someone steals my PC, will they be able to access my Ubuntu?
rainbow tables? or a quantum computer
what application would a person need to try to crack the ubuntu crypt?
i dont think i am allowed to tell you
lets just say, at this point AES crackers are custom
u cant tell me can you :) u dont know :P
if I gave you my ubuntu HDD that is encrypted. I doubt you would even know where to start in decrypting it :)
i dont think I would bother, but this article is relevant: http://www.internetnews.com/infra/article.php/1464351
I have read 100's of articles claiming that AES can be cracked!  But none of the authors has video taped proof breaking someones encrypted drive lol
the weakness is the fact that you need to pick a password to unlock the drive yourself
but notice the webpage says. however, there is no evidence the weakness is great enough cause panic yet.
with enough time I could randomly try every conceivable password
see? ALL talk, no action or proof
how much time?  3 billion yrs? lol
